m_szDocTitle: You Asked, We’re Answering Your Fuel Cell Questions « Breaking Energy - Energy industry news, analysis, and commentary
m_szDocSumamry: Energy industry news, analysis, and commentary You Asked, We’re Answering Your Fuel Cell Questions By US Department of Energy on January 29, 2014 at 5:00 PM Last week, I joined a panel of experts for a  live discussion about fuel cells , covering everything you needed to know about this clean energy technology. We asked you to submit questions in advance and during the event, and we received more questions than we could answer. So now I am answering some of your questions that went unanswered. Can you discuss fuel cells for residential and commercial buildings and their cost?  — from TydeFarm
